services.title: Our Comprehensive Services
services.subtitle: Tailored technology solutions to drive your business forward.
services.smartScaleDesc: Intelligent weighing system that automates weight recording and integrates directly with your inventory and financial systems.

smartScaleFeatures.feature1: Automatic recording of actual weight for products, pallets, or containers without human intervention
smartScaleFeatures.feature2: Prevention of manipulation or manual input errors
smartScaleFeatures.feature3: Comparison of actual weight with standard weight to detect deviations or losses
smartScaleFeatures.feature4: Direct generation of invoices and costs based on real weight
smartScaleFeatures.feature5: Instant updating of inventory and financial accounts with each weighing operation
smartScaleFeatures.feature6: Direct integration between electronic scales and packaging stations within system

hrPayroll.title: HR and Payroll Management System
hrPayroll.desc: Complete and integrated system with financial accounts for managing employee affairs and payroll calculations.

features.feature1: Based on variable settings for insurance, vacations, and taxes that can be modified when laws change
features.feature2: Respects all payroll calculation rules and penalty provisions, carrying over excess of five days to subsequent months
features.feature3: Maintains employee photos and all employment documents with reports on missing documents
features.feature4: Tracks document expiration dates to notify employees of renewals
features.feature5: Records who entered and modified data with a period transfer system to prevent tampering
features.feature6: Ability to reverse period transfers to modify data according to permissions

services.erpDesc: Full-cycle Oracle ERP services including implementation, customization, migration, and support to optimize your business processes.
services.erpFeaturesDesc: Our ERP system is designed to provide comprehensive solutions for businesses of all sizes. Here are some of the key features it offers:

features.multiUser: Multiple user permissions with precise management
features.remoteAccess: Ability to work from anywhere via the Internet
features.autoBackup: Automatic backups created multiple times daily
features.auditTrail: Complete audit trail showing who added, modified, or deleted
features.employeeDocs: Entry of employee photos and documents
features.foreignCurrency: Foreign currency support with fixed or variable rates per transaction
features.multiCompany: Multiple companies or branches with consolidated reports
features.exchangeRate: Exchange rate determination for foreign currencies
features.notes: Notes entry for each journal entry item
features.cashierLink: Link each cashier to a specific employee
features.collectionPayment: Recording collection and payment operations with separate documents

services.itSupportDesc: Proactive 24/7 monitoring, helpdesk support, and IT infrastructure management to ensure your systems are always secure and efficient.
services.customAppsDesc: We design, develop, and deploy bespoke desktop and web applications that solve unique business challenges and integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.
services.securityDesc: Implementing bank-level security protocols to protect your data, applications, and network from evolving cyber threats.

services.title: Oracle ERP Implementation
services.description: Complete Oracle ERP Cloud implementation services including system analysis, data migration, custom module development, and user training for seamless digital transformation.
features: Cloud infrastructure setup and optimization
Legacy system data migration with zero data loss
Custom module development for industry-specific needs
Real-time integration with existing business systems
Comprehensive user training and change management

services.title: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Optimization
services.description: Comprehensive ERP system optimization services to enhance performance, streamline processes, and maximize ROI from existing Oracle ERP investments.
features: Performance analysis and bottleneck identification
Database optimization and tuning
Custom report development
Workflow automation and process improvement
Integration with third-party applications

services.title: Agricultural Stations and Export Operations Management
services.description: Accounting software that handles all calculations for suppliers, customers, warehouses, treasury, and banks. It aggregates supplier data, accounts, invoices, tracks inventory and items, manages export operations to different countries, and handles operational items with expense allocation to each operation.
features: Integrated management of supplier and customer accounts
Inventory tracking and continuous item counting
Export operations management to different countries
Processing of operational items and expense allocation
Integration of all accounting operations with treasury and banks

services.title: Custom Windows Desktop Application Development
services.description: Tailored Windows desktop applications designed to automate business processes, improve workflow efficiency, and integrate seamlessly with existing enterprise systems.
features: Native Windows application development
Database integration (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL)
Offline functionality with data synchronization
Advanced reporting and analytics
Scalable architecture for future expansion

services.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics Solutions
services.description: Advanced business intelligence platform development using Oracle Analytics Cloud and custom dashboard solutions for data-driven decision making.
features: Interactive dashboard development
Real-time data visualization
Predictive analytics and forecasting
KPI tracking and performance monitoring
Data warehouse design and implementation

services.title: Supply Chain Management & Logistics Optimization
services.description: End-to-end supply chain management solution with real-time tracking, inventory optimization, and logistics coordination for improved operational efficiency.
features: Real-time inventory tracking and management
Supplier relationship management
Demand forecasting and planning
Warehouse management system
Transportation and logistics coordination

services.title: Sales Representatives and Sales Managers Management
services.description: Comprehensive solution for managing sales representatives and sales managers with detailed performance tracking and commission management.
features: Periodic reports on representative and branch performance
Monitoring sales representatives' performance and linking their sales to customers
Special permissions for sales managers to monitor the market and make faster decisions
Tracking cash collections and checks for each representative
Ability to link representative commissions to actual collections or sales volume
Setting sales targets (Goals) and comparing actual results

services.title: Smart Scale System
services.description: Intelligent weighing system that automates weight recording and integrates directly with your inventory and financial systems.
features: Automatic recording of actual weight for products, pallets, or containers without human intervention
Prevention of manipulation or manual input errors
Comparison of actual weight with standard weight to detect deviations or losses
Direct generation of invoices and costs based on real weight
Instant updating of inventory and financial accounts with each weighing operation
Direct integration between electronic scales and packaging stations within system

industries.subtitle: We understand the unique challenges of your sector and deliver targeted solutions.

manufacturing.name: Manufacturing
manufacturing.challenges: Complex supply chains, production scheduling, quality control, and inventory management.
manufacturing.solution: Customized Oracle ERP modules to streamline production, optimize inventory, and enhance supply chain visibility for increased efficiency.

healthcare.name: Agricultural Stations & Export Operations
healthcare.challenges: Managing supplier data, inventory tracking, export documentation, and cost allocation across multiple operations.
healthcare.solution: Comprehensive accounting system handling supplier/customer accounts, inventory, warehouse management, and export operations with detailed tracking of processing costs and expense allocation.

financial.name: Financial Services
financial.challenges: High-stakes data security, regulatory adherence, real-time transaction processing, and risk management.
financial.solution: Robust Oracle ERP Financials and custom software with bank-level security to automate financial operations and ensure compliance.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: See how we've helped businesses like yours achieve their goals.

studies.title: Streamlining Production for a Major Manufacturer
studies.challenge: Our client faced significant production delays and inventory inaccuracies due to a disconnected legacy system.
studies.solution: We implemented a tailored Oracle ERP solution that integrated their entire production workflow from raw materials to finished goods.
studies.result: Achieved a 30% reduction in production time and a 99.8% inventory accuracy rate within the first year.

studies.title: Optimizing Agricultural Export Operations for a Major Farming Cooperative
studies.challenge: A large agricultural cooperative needed to streamline their export documentation, inventory tracking, and cost allocation across multiple farming stations and international markets.
studies.solution: We developed a comprehensive accounting and export management system that integrated supplier data, inventory management, warehouse operations, and detailed cost tracking for each export shipment.
studies.result: Achieved 35% improvement in export processing time and 99.5% accuracy in cost allocation across all operations.

portfolio.title: ERP System Features
portfolio.subtitle: Explore the comprehensive features of our Oracle ERP system designed to streamline your business operations

general.title: General Features
general.multiUser: Multiple user permissions with precise management
general.remoteAccess: Ability to work from anywhere via the Internet
general.autoBackup: Automatic backups created multiple times daily
general.auditTrail: Complete audit trail showing who added, modified, or deleted
general.employeeDocs: Entry of employee photos and documents
general.foreignCurrency: Foreign currency support with fixed or variable rates per transaction
general.multiCompany: Multiple companies or branches with consolidated reports
general.costSystem: Integrated industrial cost system: raw materials – processing – cost centers – service centers
general.fullReports: Full financial reports without transfer (trial balance – income statement – debt ages...)
general.security: Complete security against modification and cancellation with monthly and accounting closure

ledger.title: General Ledger Features
ledger.exchangeRate: Exchange rate determination for foreign currencies with ability to modify in the transaction itself
ledger.notes: Notes entry for each journal entry item
ledger.consolidatedAccounts: Consolidated accounts for any number of accounts regardless of their nature
ledger.accountStatements: Ability to extract consolidated or separate account statements
ledger.costCenterLink: Automatic linking of discounts and additions to cost centers or sales
ledger.yearEnd: Automatic closure of revenues and expenses at year-end
ledger.unlimitedYears: Opening unlimited fiscal years without programming intervention
ledger.collectionPlans: Collection plans and follow-up for sales representatives
ledger.accountDisable: Ability to disable any account from use
ledger.userPermissions: Customization of account visibility based on user and permissions

reports.title: General Ledger Reports
reports.serviceAnalysis: Service center analysis and distribution on production

cash.title: Cash Management
cash.employeeLink: Link each cashier to a specific employee
cash.collectionPayment: Recording collection and payment operations with separate documents

banks.title: Banks & Checks
banks.accountTypes: Each bank account has 3 accounting accounts (balance – receivable bills – payable bills)
banks.checkRegister: Complete register of check movements (issuance – payment – return – cancellation...)
banks.reports: Reports: Receivable bills under collection, Returned receivable bills, Due payable bills, Returned payable bills, Comprehensive check statement

assets.title: Fixed Assets
assets.groups: Registering assets within groups with a specified depreciation rate
assets.accounts: Registering accounts specific to the asset (asset – accumulated – provision)
assets.depreciation: Issuing monthly depreciation voucher with one click
assets.details: Complete data for each asset (cost – center – commissioning date – serial – model...)
assets.reports: Comprehensive reports: Depreciation vouchers by group, Book value report, Assets report by date

aging.title: Aging Report
aging.analysis: Debt aging analysis for each customer and supplier
aging.lastTransaction: Display of last sale transaction and last collection
aging.customerAnalysis: Complete analysis of customer invoices and delay period

permissions.title: User Permissions
permissions.control: Complete control over vouchers and sensitive items

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

questions.q: What is Oracle ERP and how can it benefit my business?
questions.a: Oracle ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) is a suite of integrated business management applications. It helps automate and streamline your core processes like finance, HR, manufacturing, and supply chain, leading to increased efficiency, better decision-making, and reduced operational costs.

questions.q: How long does a typical custom software project take?
questions.a: Project timelines vary depending on the complexity and scope of the application. A small project might take a few weeks, while a large-scale enterprise system can take several months. We provide a detailed project timeline after our initial consultation and analysis phase.

questions.q: Is your pricing fixed or do you offer custom quotes?
questions.a: While we have starting prices for common service packages, most of our projects are custom-quoted. This ensures you only pay for what you need. We provide a detailed, transparent proposal after thoroughly understanding your requirements.

questions.q: What kind of support do you offer after a project is completed?
questions.a: We offer various post-launch support and maintenance packages. This includes technical support, bug fixes, security updates, and options for ongoing feature enhancements to ensure your application remains effective and up-to-date.

questions.q: Do you work with international clients?
questions.a: Yes, absolutely. While we are based in Cairo, we have successfully delivered projects for clients across the globe. We leverage modern communication tools to ensure seamless collaboration regardless of your location.

exportModule.title: Export Management System
exportModule.subtitle: Comprehensive export management system with detailed shipment tracking and financial analysis
exportModule.shipmentTrackingDesc: The system displays detailed information for each shipment, including:
shipmentTrackingItems: Lot No. associated with raw materials or products
financialValuesItems: Shipment value in the client's foreign currency
Equivalent value in Egyptian pounds according to the exchange rate recorded in the system
exportModule.costBreakdownDesc: The system clearly displays the cost breakdown into:
costBreakdownItems: Raw material costs (raw materials - packaging materials - auxiliary materials)
exportModule.actualExpensesDesc: Monitor all expenses associated with each shipment, including:
actualExpensesItems: Raw material supply invoices for the shipment
exportModule.internalCostBreakdown: Internal cost breakdown into main elements with precision
collectionsDiscountsItems: Discount granted to the client (if any)
Collections: Collection percentage, amount collected, cash payment dates
Net invoice after collections: (Invoice value - Discount - Collected payments)
Remaining balance on the client for their transactions with the company: Total invoices, Total collections, Total discounts
exportModule.archiveDesc1: Save all shipment data in a complete electronic file
exportModule.archiveDesc2: Maintain a special archive for documents:
exportModule.archiveBenefit: This facilitates reference for any review or accounting reconciliation
exportModule.shipmentItemsDesc: Divide the shipment into items according to:
shipmentItemsItems: Number of units inside each pallet
exportModule.expenseDistribution: The system uses this data to distribute general expenses (shipping - preparation - clearance):
exportModule.distributionMethod: The system distributes expenses according to the number of pallets as a percentage of total monthly operations

costingModule.title: Costing Module
costingModule.subtitle: Comprehensive production cost management system with actual costing methodology
costingModule.methodologyDesc: The system is based on Actual Costing during the production month.
costingModule.bomTitle: Raw Materials and BOM (Bill of Materials)
costingModule.bomDesc1: Material ratios for each product are determined through BOM.
costingModule.bomDesc2: The system automatically issues raw material documents according to BOM ratios.
costingModule.bomDesc3: Variable materials are manually issued based on workshop instructions.
costingModule.bomDesc4: When entering actual inventory at the end of the month:
costingModule.qualityDesc1: A portion of production is issued for inspection and loaded to Quality Inspection cost.
costingModule.qualityDesc2: Quantity can be returned for inspection or to the warehouse, resulting in automatic reduction of quality expense.

inventoryModule.title: Inventory Management
inventoryModule.subtitle: Comprehensive inventory management system with advanced tracking and valuation capabilities
inventoryModule.structureAdditional: Additional flexible classification based on business activity that does not affect coding
inventoryModule.structureLots: Dividing a single item into multiple lots
inventoryModule.itemAttributesReports: Ability to display inventory reports based on any of these attributes
